title: Bronzies look here for help*
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b52kZtDunBs

If your a bronzie, you should watch this and learn to play better.

replies.body: Who would replace Taric for bronzies because I find him incredibly boring.
If your in bronze, you don't have good mechanics, and taric doesn't require good mechanics.
m8 taric takes skill to play because he doesnt have mobility.
In bronze the lack of mobility matters less because your enemies don't know how to punish it properly.

HAHA, Haven't even watched it yet but bless Sky Williams.

after watching this video:

his proof why the positive stuff works: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU (Yeah I know I've only said it 999 times)
